item.title: Comment on What do different countries pay for Olympic gold medals? by Crikey
item.description:
I'm disgusted by how Australia pays athletes three times as much for winning a gold medal as a bronze. When I was a lad we were told to get out there and come third for Australia. But these days kids expect a gold medal for winning a gold medal. It makes me sick. What's the matter? Third place not good enough for you?

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/what-do-different-countries-pay-for-olympic-gold-medals.html?commentID=160789066

item.title: Comment on What do different countries pay for Olympic gold medals? by Smug Belgian
item.description:
I find it hard to take seriously any chart which does not include Belgium.

Which is also why I distrust the actual medal tables.

item.title: Comment on What do different countries pay for Olympic gold medals? by Ben G
item.description:
There needs to be study on why Great Britain outperforms so massively for their size and spending every single Olympics.

They are always top 3/4 in the medal table, even came 2nd in Rio 2016!
How do they do it??

The only countries that beat them have an unfair advantage with massively larger populations (China, USA).

So why is UK punching so far above its weight??

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/what-do-different-countries-pay-for-olympic-gold-medals.html?commentID=160789071
